name: Transparent NPC Wall
description: An invisible wall that blocks NPCs and other actors from passing through.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Horizontal Length
fields.description: Defines the width of the invisible wall.

fields.name: Vertical Length
fields.description: Defines the height of the invisible wall.
